channel.title: [PI] Project Lost Souls
channel.description:
Hello Guys! I have finally decided to make my own server and see what i can give out there that others may not have. I am going to be using a 317 as i am quite new to this and haven't got much experiences in the area. The main purpose of this is to make a server in which i feel will meet the bar of high quality and offer many players needs!
[u]Progress[/u]
--Done-- - fixed major bank issue (now has inventory deposit) - fixed cyclopses they now drop d defenders - fixed magic arena shop - added multi colored infinty robes to mage bank rewards mini game - update combat animations to new ones so all anims should look newer - fix animations for vestalong, stat hammer specs - redid pvp armour req's fully work! - added spirit sheild reqs - fixed random drops from assault - made yell have tags - changed rarity of barrows items from chest - fixed a random command kakker in regular commands - fixed donator cape from god to hover - fixed dfs animation and gfx when u spec - made it so u cannot drink an overload unless ur over 50 hp to keep people from dieing - people now get +1 vote point for voting - chaotic weapon recharging added finally! - avatar of destruction removed and added sea troll queen - underwater area ! - all the lunar spells work - minigame that requires to kill minions before you can kill the boss (godwars) - better slayer rewards - fix ice blitz somehow - made custom skilling area - fixed frostbones noted - Add the come closer button for familiars - added summoning timers - added summoning points - Added staff of light model and attack anims - fixed double hits on npcs familiars - fixed double hits on npcs familiars - Insta swithing added - Familiar follows correctly - Summoning vs Npc added - Summoning vs player added - Fixed deposit bob glitch - Fixed familiar dead glitch - Added a shop for the dominion minigame - loyalty shop fixed - Kq drops fixed - droplog acces it by going to data - > droplogs > playername - Ice strykewurms now require 90 slayer - Custom titles for players (loyalty points) - Handcannon special fixed - zamorak mjolnir equipmentslot fixed - A minigame that has waves in it, the higher you go the harder the npcs are - Invisible hits fixed - Teleport animation + graphics have been updated - sponsor command (ownercommand) opens a voting site - made the interface for athanema minigame - Interface working properly (server sided) - seercull bow equipment slot has been fixed - Starter equipment has been upgraded - Water altar has now been added to runecrafting - lottery has now been set to 25m - dark bow has now been added to the ranging guild shop - make the objects client sided for concentrated gold ore and coal - New skilltab Interface (client sided) - New point interface - The magical chest spawns randomly - Shops moved to a new area - Portals added to travel to home and vice versa --Done--
--Client sided--- - New emote interface - New quest tab interface - Fixed lock experience issue - Increased client stability - Donator status icon added - New skillTab Interface - Transparent xp total interface - Fixed splatters in pest control - Fixed everlasting safe spotting - summoning special attack for NPC's with %
--To Do-- - 90% correct familiar spawning - Fix Gui admin allowed trade, drop etc - Summoning interface 60% - spec bar in % - New shop area - Move home - Add Hunting area - Imp correct lvls - Working butterfly net - 508 Map data - Fix known Dupes - Add making extreme for herblore - Fix leech special for curses - Fix all saps for curses - Add nomad Npc helper spawns - Add poisoned new hit maker - Add clan wars purple portal - Add clan wars red portal - Make new donator shop --To Do--
[u]Pictures[/u]
Only some Pictures of Key updates i have added -
[img]http://i48.servimg.com/u/f48/16/88/62/27/x10_hi10.png[/img]
This Interface is under construction at this moment in time but thought id show how im getting on. (almost complete)
[img]http://i48.servimg.com/u/f48/16/88/62/27/summon10.png[/img]
[img]http://i48.servimg.com/u/f48/16/88/62/27/new_te10.png[/img]
More will come once i add more stuff :D
--Thread Last Updated on - 11/12/11--

anyways thanks for the good luck! hope to make this a successful project

item.title: [PI] Project Lost Souls
item.dc:creator: @bin703 bin703
item.description:
@bin703 wrote:

Hello Guys! I have finally decided to make my own server and see what i can give out there that others may not have. I am going to be using a 317 as i am quite new to this and haven’t got much experiences in the area. The main purpose of this is to make a server in which i feel will meet the bar of high quality and offer many players needs!

Progress

–Done–

  • fixed major bank issue (now has inventory deposit)
  • fixed cyclopses they now drop d defenders
  • fixed magic arena shop
  • added multi colored infinty robes to mage bank rewards mini game
  • update combat animations to new ones so all anims should look newer
  • fix animations for vestalong, stat hammer specs
  • redid pvp armour req’s fully work!
  • added spirit sheild reqs
  • fixed random drops from assault
  • made yell have tags
  • changed rarity of barrows items from chest
  • fixed a random command kakker in regular commands
  • fixed donator cape from god to hover
  • fixed dfs animation and gfx when u spec
  • made it so u cannot drink an overload unless ur over 50 hp to keep people from dieing
  • people now get +1 vote point for voting
  • chaotic weapon recharging added finally!
  • avatar of destruction removed and added sea troll queen
  • underwater area !
  • all the lunar spells work
  • minigame that requires to kill minions before you can kill the boss (godwars)
  • better slayer rewards
  • fix ice blitz somehow
  • made custom skilling area
  • fixed frostbones noted
  • Add the come closer button for familiars
  • added summoning timers
  • added summoning points
  • Added staff of light model and attack anims
  • fixed double hits on npcs familiars
  • fixed double hits on npcs familiars
  • Insta swithing added
  • Familiar follows correctly
  • Summoning vs Npc added
  • Summoning vs player added
  • Fixed deposit bob glitch
  • Fixed familiar dead glitch
  • Added a shop for the dominion minigame
  • loyalty shop fixed
  • Kq drops fixed
  • droplog acces it by going to data - > droplogs > playername
  • Ice strykewurms now require 90 slayer
  • Custom titles for players (loyalty points)
  • Handcannon special fixed
  • zamorak mjolnir equipmentslot fixed
  • A minigame that has waves in it, the higher you go the harder the npcs are
  • Invisible hits fixed
  • Teleport animation + graphics have been updated
  • sponsor command (ownercommand) opens a voting site
  • made the interface for athanema minigame
  • Interface working properly (server sided)
  • seercull bow equipment slot has been fixed
  • Starter equipment has been upgraded
  • Water altar has now been added to runecrafting
  • lottery has now been set to 25m
  • dark bow has now been added to the ranging guild shop
  • make the objects client sided for concentrated gold ore and coal
  • New skilltab Interface (client sided)
  • New point interface
  • The magical chest spawns randomly
  • Shops moved to a new area
  • Portals added to travel to home and vice versa
    –Done–

–Client sided—

  • New emote interface
  • New quest tab interface
  • Fixed lock experience issue
  • Increased client stability
  • Donator status icon added
  • New skillTab Interface
  • Transparent xp total interface
  • Fixed splatters in pest control
  • Fixed everlasting safe spotting
  • summoning special attack for NPC’s with %

–To Do–

  • 90% correct familiar spawning
  • Fix Gui admin allowed trade, drop etc
  • Summoning interface 60%
  • spec bar in %
  • New shop area
  • Move home
  • Add Hunting area
  • Imp correct lvls
  • Working butterfly net
  • 508 Map data
  • Fix known Dupes
  • Add making extreme for herblore
  • Fix leech special for curses
  • Fix all saps for curses
  • Add nomad Npc helper spawns
  • Add poisoned new hit maker
  • Add clan wars purple portal
  • Add clan wars red portal
  • Make new donator shop
    –To Do–

Pictures

Only some Pictures of Key updates i have added -

x10_hi10.png771×553

This Interface is under construction at this moment in time but thought id show how im getting on. (almost complete)

summon10.png770×552

More will come once i add more stuff

–Thread Last Updated on - 11/12/11–

Read full topic
